description: scripts for quickbms: universal script based files extractor and reimporter
pre_install: $quickbms64 = '@echo off & setlocal enabledelayedexpansion & set prefix=$dir & set "args=%prefix%%1" & shift & :loop & if "%~1"=="" goto end & set "args=!args! %1" & shift & goto loop & :end & "$(appdir quickbms)\bin\quickbms.exe" !args!'

$quickbms32 = '@echo off & setlocal enabledelayedexpansion & set prefix=$dir & set "args=%prefix%%1" & shift & :loop & if "%~1"=="" goto end & set "args=!args! %1" & shift & goto loop & :end & "$(appdir quickbms)\bin\quickbms32.exe" !args!'
